Package rockpaperscissors

Class StratOne

  • java.lang.Object
    • rockpaperscissors.StratOne

  • public class StratOne
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the strategies that the Computer will use when going up against the user or another computer.

    581140

    • Method Detail

      • StratvStrat

        public java.lang.String[] StratvStrat​(java.lang.String comp1Choice,
                                      java.lang.String comp2Choice,
                                      int win)
        Both comp1 and comp2 use a strategy. If it losses, it chooses the weapon that neither chose last round. If it wins, it chooses the weapon of the opponent from the last round. If it draws, it choose a random weapon.
        Parameters:
        comp1Choice - The choice of comp1 from the previous round.
        comp2Choice - The choice of comp2 from the previous round.
        win - The winner of the previous round
        Returns:
        String[] Returns the new weapons for both comp1 and comp2 in an array.

      • StratvRand

        public java.lang.String[] StratvRand​(java.lang.String comp1Choice,
                                     java.lang.String comp2Choice,
                                     int win)
        Only comp1 uses a strategy. If it losses, it chooses the weapon that neither chose last round. If it wins, it chooses the weapon of the opponent from the last round. If it draws, it choose a random weapon.
        Parameters:
        comp1Choice - The choice of comp1 from the previous round.
        comp2Choice - The choice of comp2 from the previous round.
        win - The winner of the previous round
        Returns:
        String[] Returns the new weapons for both comp1 and comp2 in an array.

      • RandvRand

        public void RandvRand​()
        Both comp1 adn comp2 choose a random weapon.

      • StratvPlayer

        public java.lang.String StratvPlayer​(java.lang.String playerChoice,
                                     java.lang.String comp1Choice,
                                     int win)
        Player goes up against a computer that has a strategy. If it losses, it chooses the weapon that neither chose last round. If it wins, it chooses the weapon of the opponent from the last round. If it draws, it choose a random weapon.
        Parameters:
        playerChoice - The choice of player from the previous round.
        comp1Choice - The choice of comp1 from the previous round.
        win - The winner of the previous round
        Returns:
        newCompChoice Returns the new weapon for comp1.

      • RandvPlayer

        public void RandvPlayer​()
        Comp1 chooses a random weapon, and the player is prompted to pick a weapon.

      • getComp1

        public Computer getComp1​()
        Returns comp1 when it has the new weapon assigned to it.

        this.comp1 Gives comp1 the attributes of the Computer class, and returns the weapon instance from the StratOne class
